Reviews.Title: False Advertising
Reviews.Author: Felicia Gilkes
Reviews.Content: When I purchased this product it did not say for Europe/Asia Market as in the headline now. It showed as "Nokia 308 Asha Black Factory Unlocked Dual SIM "I travelled out of the US and on my return was unable to return the phone as it was over 30days.Why would I purchase a phone if it doesn't work in the US.Now I have a phone that does not work and I am out of pocket.

Reviews.Title: Nokia 308 internationally unlocked - Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Shanti Singh
Reviews.Content: When I brought this phone it said it was internationally unlocked.  Only to find that is not the case.  I am very disappointed!!!  I paid lots of money for the phone.  I need to get my phone unlocked!!!!  Need to use the phone.

Reviews.Title: Loved it
Reviews.Author: Fredrick Marshall
Reviews.Content: It filled the bill. I was able to get thing started with out a problem. I recieved it with out a hitch.

ProductInfo.Features:
GSM 2G: GSM 850 / 1900 - SIM 1 & SIM 2 / GSM 900 / 1800 - SIM 1 & SIM 2
Display: 240 x 400 pixels, 3.0 inches (~155 ppi pixel density)
Memory: 20 MB, 128 MB ROM, 64 MB RAM
Camera: 2 MP, 1600x1200 pixels
Europe/ASIA MARKET phone, may NOT work on US AT&T; T-Mobile
ProductInfo.Name: Nokia 308 Asha Black Factory Unlocked Dual SIM phone 2MP For EUROPE / ASIA MARKET
